thread.title: Sanchez, Giroud and Ramsey guide Arsenal to win at Watford
thread.title_full: Sanchez, Giroud and Ramsey guide Arsenal to win at Watford

author: wtopstaff
title: Sanchez, Giroud and Ramsey guide Arsenal to win at Watford
text:
Home » News » Sports » Sanchez, Giroud and Ramsey… Sanchez, Giroud and Ramsey guide Arsenal to win at Watford By The Associated Press October 17, 2015 2:25 pm Arsenal’s Aaron Ramsey, center, celebrates with teammates Olivier Giroud, right, and Hector Bellerin after scoring their third goal during their English Premier League soccer match against Watford at Vicarage Road, Watford, England, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. (Scott Heavey/PA via AP) UNITED KINGDOM OUT - NO SALES - NO ARCHIVES 
LONDON (AP) — Second-half goals from Alexis Sanchez, Olivier Giroud and Aaron Ramsey guided Arsenal to a 3-0 win at Watford on Saturday that kept the team in second place in the Premier League. 
Sanchez’s goal came in the 62nd minute when Mesut Ozil was tackled in the penalty area, only for the ball to roll onto the Chilean’s feet for him to lift over Heurehlo Gomes and into the net off the post. 
Six minutes later, Olivier Giroud fired a cut-back from Ozil into the roof of the net before Ramsey added a third following a neat pass from Hector Bellerin. 
Watford had promising spells of possession throughout the game but its momentum was lost with three goals in 12 minutes from Arsenal. Topics:
